SEARCH
Package tps.tp4.structures

Class Structure

java.lang.Object
tps.tp4.structures.Structure
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Impactable
Direct Known Subclasses:
S_Barracks, S_Factory, S_Farm, S_Hospital, S_House, S_Mine, S_WoodCuttersLodge
public abstract class Structure extends Object implements Serializable, Impactable
Abstract base class for all structures in the colony. Handles resource costs, production, and impact on the colony.
See Also:
